title: False ban will never accept it
body:
Game 1
In-Game
Hide inner Bush: get ready for lane more to come bud
Hide inner Bush: glacial jinx op?
Hide inner Bush: ok jinx
Hide inner Bush: tf y do u play ranked?
Hide inner Bush: lee sin do u main jg? why play around top its a shen? theres a jinx bot lane getting all the roams and ganks in the world
Hide inner Bush: yea gg who cares anymore
Hide inner Bush: i remember the first time i got ganks and roams and enemy jg does nothing
Hide inner Bush: ok kid lol first time u won lane proud of u
Hide inner Bush: gg easy
Hide inner Bush: cant play the game they got ganks and roams
Hide inner Bush: they got ahead cant lane now
Hide inner Bush: gg tho lee focus top more
Hide inner Bush: 2 roams from mid
Hide inner Bush: its theres
Hide inner Bush: y?
Hide inner Bush: nice overstay top
Hide inner Bush: lol lee
Hide inner Bush: u waste all ur time top for what?
Hide inner Bush: yup 0 and 6 cus ur laner bot 2 times
Hide inner Bush: tf supposed to be a romang champ i thought
Hide inner Bush: tf going in for what?>
Hide inner Bush: 9x panth he asked for a gank or a roam like enemy bot lane got
Hide inner Bush: never once was toxic lol kids funny
Hide inner Bush: yup i know bro we lost lane but u got help tho we got zero its all good
Post-Game
Hide inner Bush: stomped in lane? lol u kileld us 1 time 2 vs 2 then got 2 roams and a gank and only killed us 1 time 2 vs 2 after that
Hide inner Bush: all good i lost lane 1 time out of 10 games
Hide inner Bush: all good son
Hide inner Bush: swap mids i think we win anyways
Game 2
Pre-Game
Hide inner Bush: ahri did u just lane vs a kled last game?
In-Game
Hide inner Bush: no summs bot free kill
Hide inner Bush: ty
Hide inner Bush: gg top never had a chance trolls are out
Hide inner Bush: what are u?
Hide inner Bush: no ganks doesnt excuse 0 and 5?
Hide inner Bush: enjoy ur ban lil guy
Hide inner Bush: ?
Hide inner Bush: fun game died once all lane now died to every1 that got spoon fed gg top'
Hide inner Bush: what lesson? we didnt get to play the game?
Hide inner Bush: jg isnt my duo
Hide inner Bush: u blame jg for u doing what u did top
Hide inner Bush: gg top easy
Post-Game
Hide inner Bush: flames jg and us all game
 not a single negative or toxic thing in this chat I was pantheon and was joking about 9xs me cus team said to 9xs me cus I asked for a gank while being camped nothing at all in entire chat punishable . Riot rremove this false ban ur company looks like more of a joke than ever

replies.body:
You weren't punished for misbehaving in two game. You were punished for misbehaving in _two more_ games, in a consistent pattern of negative behavior that breaks the game's rules. Additionally, the reform card doesn't always show all the logs that led to your punishment: it randomly selects up to several logs. You might see three logs, but you also might see as few as one, even for players whose punishment stems not from a small number of egregious infractions but rather from dozens of instances of mild toxicity. The purpose of the reform card is to tell you how to reform, so it shows you an example of the behavior that prompted your punishment and explains that such behavior is inappropriate and should be avoided if you want to maintain an account in good standing.

Game 1: you spent the entire time arguing and whining.

Game 2: you spent most of the time accusing teammates of trolling, talking about how they'll be banned, and arguing.

You weren't anything _but_ toxic and negative.

> [{quoted}](name=Hide inner Bush,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=La1K6AfV,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2019-08-11T08:53:12.265+0000)
>
>..Removed by Moderation..

Hey!

I don't work for Riot.

>snip

You say this for human beings over a silly ban?  Maybe you should worry about your own judgement.
Make a new account and be nicer this time.
